value.title: StarCraft 2: INSANE Game - uThermal's MASS RAVEN Strategy!
value.excerpt: StarCraft 2 match between uThermal and Jason (top 25 Grandmaster on NA) where uThermal plays his latest strategy: Mass Raven and Hellion. This is a crazy macro game of Terran versus Terran with hundreds of Hellions and Ravens.  uThermal's Hellion Raven to Grandmaster League: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhaCXeA_nfD0yq1NJ8C7dZi9vRxYfEHNW

This is the current Zerg versus Protoss StarCraft 2 meta. From a turtling Sky Toss based approach, we now see a very heavy focus on Gateway
